EmailTemplate.name: GS Lithuania Auto response
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your request #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi!
Great to hear from you and thank you for your email.
Your request is #{!Case.CaseNumber}
We will answer you within two business days.
While you are waiting to hear from us, you may look at www.flysas.com for travel inspiration!
Best Regards, SAS Group Sales SAS Customer Service Monday – Friday 09.00 – 17.00 Phone: +371 6785 2191
Scandinavian Airlines System flysas.com, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube
